run() - Method in class main2.Admin
Run admin menu If selected, provides several options, each of them calls method of the same name as option name 1st method calls Admin.addUser() 2nd method calls Admin.removeUser(int) by calling Admin.getUsers() 3rd method calls Admin.getUsers() 5th method calls Admin.exit()
run() - Method in class main2.BaseResearcher
Menu for researcher has several options, 1st adds research papers, 2nd let to view research papers,
run() - Method in class main2.Manager
Menu for manager, uses 5 options, 1st calls Manager.addCourse(), 2nd calls Manager.addCourseToStudent(Student),
run() - Method in class main2.ResearcherDecorator
Menu for researcher decorator ,the same as the BaseResearcher
run() - Method in class main2.Student
Menu for student provided with several options, 1st - register for course, 2nd- view transcript, 3rd - drop course
run() - Method in class main2.Teacher
Menu for teacher provided by several options, 1st lets to send the complaint and urgency level , 2nd - view courses,
